unnormalised: Arre, ani ek circular, amkam Block Development Officer-ak "Shri" B.D.O. Kumar mhunn ulo korunk sangta? "BDO saab" itlem formal naslem mhunn bhognam? Atam panchayat office-antle chai-ui UPSC interview bhaxen dista.
normalised: Arre, ani ek circular aamkam Block Development Officer-ak "Shri" B-D-O. Kumar mhunn ulo korunk sangta? "B-D-O saab" itlo formal naslo mhunn kitem? Aata panchayat officerantli chai pollun distele U-P-S-C interview-a sarkhi.
